select.if: SELECT A.FUNID,A.FUNNAME,A.FUNURL,A.FUNPID FROM SYSFUNCTION A WHERE A.FUNSTATE=1
SELECT A.FUNID,A.FUNNAME,A.FUNURL,A.FUNPID FROM SYSFUNCTION A INNER JOIN ROLERIGHT B ON A.FUNID=B.FUNID WHERE B.ROLEID=#{roleid} AND A.FUNSTATE=1

mapper.select: SELECT A.FUNID,A.FUNNAME,A.FUNURL,A.FUNPID,A.FUNSTATE, (CASE WHEN A.FUNURL IS NULL or LENGTH(A.FUNURL) =0 THEN '无' ELSE B.FUNNAME END) AS FUNPNAME FROM SYSFUNCTION A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSFUNCTION B ON A.FUNPID=B.FUNID

SELECT A.FUNID,A.FUNNAME,A.FUNURL,A.FUNPID,A.FUNSTATE, (CASE WHEN A.FUNURL IS NULL or LENGTH(A.FUNURL) =0 THEN '无' ELSE B.FUNNAME END) AS FUNPNAME FROM SYSFUNCTION A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYSFUNCTION B ON A.FUNPID=B.FUNID where A.FUNNAME like concat("%",#{funname},"%")
mapper.insert: insert into sysfunction (FUNID, FUNNAME, FUNURL, FUNPID, FUNSTATE) values (#{funid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{funname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{funstate,jdbcType=INTEGER})
